bio:
Welcome to my profile! I am an university graduate in science, and working as web developer and designer since 2007. Over the past 7 years, I have developed a wide range of websites using HTML5/CSS3, PHP/Wordpress, MySQL and jQuery, Magento, Opencart, Codeigniter, Shopify, YII, Symfony, Angular, Laravel including sites for startup companies, small businesses and individuals. I enjoy designing, building and maintaining clean, professional, easy to navigate websites.

I specialize in WordPress websites, creating custom themes as well as modifying and building plugins and adding custom PHP and jQuery. Many of the sites I've built include the WooCommerce shopping cart integration and responsive layout. Having an intense experience in WordPress CMS, I have gained expertise in wordpress themes/Plugins, Advance customization, PHP, Photoshop, Mobile-compatible responsive designs and many more skills. As a professional Web designer and development, I have fulfill different projects as per client expectations and capable to provide the relevant output with full professionalism and stunning look. I am extremely talented with HTML5/CSS3/javascript, Bootstrap/Responsive designs.

I can help you or your business create a website from design concept to a completed, polished and professional site. I can also help maintain and update existing websites. Creativity is my passion, its what drives me to produce innovative and original brand design and advertising campaigns for clients. Working with the latest technology I create rich media experience both online and offline.

My Clients are my first priority and as such I try hard to provide maximum quality work, timeliness delivery of my products and cost value. I consider in building and nurturing relationship, which is the foundation of the business objectives. I listen very much to my clients, predict their needs and act accordingly to provide them the worth.

My work principles:   

* Comprehensive analysis - I carefully analyse work requirements and bid only if absolutely sure that I'm able to provide highest quality.  

* Availability - I'm online 10 hours per day, 5 days per week to respond your requests. Outside work hours I'm on phone/skype for emergency questions. I live in India but can shift my work hours according to my client's needs.   

* Support - I provide support for my projects after they are complete. This includes project related consultations and bug fixing.

bio:
I am a creative writer with a burning passion for crafting words into beautiful and captivating pieces. I take every work of writing as my very last and thus, I create the best every time I put pen on paper or my fingers on the keyboard. I have years of experience in writing and proofreading. I have had only positive reviews from all my clients in the past.

I recently joined this platform to further explore other areas which would help nourish my steadily growing writing career. A picture might be worth a thousand words, but a thousand words of mine will be enough to elicit the deepest emotions in you.
 
So come along, let’s create the most captivating pieces ever seen in the history of writing. I look earnestly to working with you. 

Feel free to send me a message.

Diepreye Victoria

I am available to work anytime.

I also offer very flexible working terms depending on how and when you want your work done.
